Royal College of Pathologists of Australasia. Tumours of haematopoietic and lymphoid tissue, Structured Reporting Protocol (1st Edition 2010). [Internet]. 2010;[cited 2010 Mar 21 ] Available from: http://www.rcpa.edu.au//static/File/Asset%20library/public%20documents/Publications/StructuredReporting/TUMOURS%20OF%20HAEMATOPOIETIC%20AND%20LYMPHOID%20TISSUE%20STRUCTURED%20REPORTING%20PROTOCOL.pdf
College of American Pathologists. Lymphoma and Hodkgin disease - Full protocol [Internet]. 2005 Jan ;[cited 2009 Jul 25 ] Available from: http://www.cap.org/apps/docs/committees/cancer/cancer_protocols/2005/lymphnonhodg05_pw.pdf

details.purpose: To record detailed findings about lymphoma and other haematopoietic tumours, excluding leukaemias, found on microscopic examination.
details.use: To record detailed findings about microscopic examination of tissue related to lymphoma or other hameatopietic tumour, excluding leukaemias Use as a component archetype in the context of a suite of archetypes that make up a histopathology report ie OBSERVATION.lab_test.histopathology.
details.misuse: Not designed to be used within any other archetype other than OBSERVATION.lab_test.histopathology. Not designed to be used to record microscopic findings for leukaemias.

details.purpose: لتسجيل الموجودات التفصيلية حول سرطان الخلايا الليمفاوية و أورام الأنسجة المكونة للدم, فيما عدا الأنواع ابيضاض الدم, التي تُكتَشف عند الفحص المجهري
details.use: لتسجيل الموجودات التفصيلية حول الفحص المجهري للنسيج المتعلق بسرطان الخلايا الليمفاوية أو أورام الأنسجة الأخرى المكونة للدم, فيما عدا ابيضاض الدم. يستخدم في سياق مجموعة من النماذج التي يتكون منها تقرير الهيستوباثولوجيا, نموذج ملاحظة.اختبار معملي.الهيستوباثولوجيا
details.misuse: لم يتم تصميم هذا النموذج ليتم استخدامه مع نموذج آخر غير ملاحظة. اختبار معملي. الهيستوباثولوجيا. لم يتم تصميمه لتسجيل الموجودات المجهرية لابيضاض الدم.

items.items: Microscopic anatomical pathology findings related to lymphoma and other haematopoietic tumours, excluding leukaemias.
Findings of host cell reactions to tumour.
Finding of a host cell reaction to tumour.
Finding of host tissue reactions to tumour.
Findings of pattern of abnormal cell infiltration.
Necrotic host tissue reaction is present.
Sclerotic host tissue reaction is present.
Granulomatous host tissue reaction is present.
Suppurative host tissue reaction to tumour is present.
High Endothelial Venule (HEV) hyperplasia is present.
Amyloid host tissue reaction is present.
T-cell rich host cell reaction is present.
Eosinophil-rich host cell reaction is present.
Histiocyte-rich host cell reaction is present.
Neutrophil-rich host cell reaction is present.
Plasma cell-rich host cell reaction is present.
Erythrophagocytic host cell reaction is present.
Small or intermediate tumour cell size (smaller than a histiocyte nucleus).
Medium tumour cell size (equal to a histiocyte nucleus).
Large tumour cell size (larger than a histiocyte nucleus).
The tumour cell size has not been determined.
Signet ring cell features are present.
Generic abnormal cell features have not been determined.
Reed-Sternberg cell-like cytomorphology features are present.
Specific cytomorphology features have not been determined.
Presence of a host cell reaction has not been determined.
Presence of a host tissue reaction has not been determined.
